name: War Ostrich
description: The War Ostrich is a large, agile creature known for its remarkable speed and combat capabilities. It has strong claws and a beak, making it a surprising threat on the battlefield.
memorable: Its ability to leap great distances and knock foes prone gives it a unique advantage in combat.
goals: To disrupt and overwhelm foes on the battlefield.
relations: May be found alongside other wild beasts or as a combat mount.
environment: Natural environments such as plains or savannas where it can use its speed.
strengths: High mobility allows quick repositioning, and it can disable enemies with its knockdown ability.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma make it difficult to control or direct.
attacks: Melee attacks with beak and claws dealing piercing and bludgeoning damage, respectively.
most_powerful_ability: Leaping Pounce that allows it to knock targets prone for tactical advantage.
additional_information: Can use Dash or Disengage as a bonus action for mobility.
Intimidating Screech can disrupt enemy actions.
Standing Leap allows significant jumping capabilities.
